document.text:
From: (USANYS)"  
To: (USANYS)" c; 
Cc: SANYS 
Subject: Re: Epstein Autopsy 
Date: Sun, 11 Aug 2019 20:42:51 +0000 
, "Berman, Geoffre 
(USANYS)" 
"El= 
Thanks for the update 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Aug 11, 2019, at 3:38 PM, Ela (USANYS) < > wrote: 
Thanks, 
Sent from my iPad 
On Aug 11, 2019, at 3:30 PM, (USANYS) < > wrote: 
All, 
OCME just completed the autopsy and the findings are consistent with strangulation/hanging. Epstein had a broken 
hiatal bone and injuries to the left shoulder that are consistent with hanging. Per OCME, there is no reason to suspect 
that Epstein did not hang himself. OCME will wait to finalize the report until after the toxicology reports come back, 
and OCME has had an opportunity to review any reports of interviews of the first guards on the scene who discovered 
Epstein. 
We will continue to keep you posted. Please let us know if you have any questions. Thanks. 
EFTA00023982
